channel.title: Help with Models / Cache (HUGE PROBLEM)
channel.description:
My client is a Bluurs Client. A long time ago, I was able to add new items without errors. They were showing the right model on the client.
But now, I don't know what happened. Each time I try to add new ones, it will appear as a junk on the client (like a wall, whatever). This is very weird.
Also:
- When I do add models or add model *model # here* commands, they say it works on the client (it's showing the thing in the chatbox and disconnect and relog me). But after when I load the client again (once I exit the client and run it again), I get the black screen with the 5 steps to do when it says "Loading Models".
Can anyone help please I've been trying for age to fix that and I'm unsuccesful.
Thank you ! :)

Yes I am. It’s the same one.

A long time ago, I was able to add new items without errors. They were showing the right model on the client.

But now, I don’t know what happened. Each time I try to add new ones, it will appear as a junk on the client (like a wall, whatever). This is very weird.

Also:

  • When I do add models or add model model # here commands, they say it works on the client (it’s showing the thing in the chatbox and disconnect and relog me). But after when I load the client again (once I exit the client and run it again), I get the black screen with the 5 steps to do when it says “Loading Models”.

Can anyone help please I’ve been trying for age to fix that and I’m unsuccesful.

Thank you ! :)[/quote]

Are you still using the same client that previously worked when adding models?
